ygData.subject: Re: Where to hunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: Druids in Rathe Mountains are harder now, at 27th they were all RED and GREEN , no blue even or yellow ... From: Heath Barker To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
Druids in Rathe Mountains are harder now, at 27th they were all RED and GREEN , no blue even or yellow

----- Original Message -----
From: Heath Barker
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Tuesday, October 19, 1999 10:43 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Where to hunt?


Sister Island more money better loot till 15th then off to waste some
birdies near entrance to Arena in Lake Rathe IMHO fastest route to 20 at 20
time to relocate to either Treants in group or to Druids in Rathe mountains
either one will get you to 30 I have no suggestions to get you to 31 :)
----- Original Message -----
From: Dark <dark@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, October 16, 1999 7:36 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Where to hunt?


> From: "Dark" <dark@...>
>
> Well personally I'd stay in Nro doing dervs paticular camp 3 since more
> thugs spawn there until 16. Once you hit 16 head for Lake R and do Aviaks.
>
> Naeeldar Dark Elf Necromancer of the almost 40th Circle
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Aazen1@... <Aazen1@...>
> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
> Date: Saturday, October 16, 1999 11:55 AM
> Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Where to hunt?
>
>
> >From: Aazen1@...
> >
> >Hi, I am a level 15 DE Necro and I was wondering if anyone had any
> >suggestions as to where I could hunt?I am currently doing Dervs in NRo,
but
> >even if I have the entire Dorn camp to myself, the experience isn't that
> >good(great loot though) cause they all con blue or green.I was wondering
if
> >anyone could recommend anywhere else to hunt?Also, could anyone recommend
> >anywhere to hunt at lvl 16 as well?It'll soon come and I would like to
> >already have an idea of where I want to go-besides crocs and camains(sp)
in
> >Oasis.
> >
> >Thanks in advance!
> >Aazen, lvl 15(soon to be 16) DE Necromancer

be
